attributes.action: commit seller and buyer into a house purchase when a price is agreed
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Once a price has been agreed on a property and it is 'sold subject to contract', this should be legaly binding.  If either the seller or the buyer backs out of this agreement they should be liable for the other parties costs that have been incurred e.g. solicitors fees, land charges search fees, survey fees etc.
